value.title: Create a Datetime column in Power Query/ M language - Download 44

value.title: DAX Fridays! #11: Using variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Variables are an extremely useful feature in DAX, but perhaps not a well known one. Variables, 1. Make your formulas more readable 2. You can reuse them through your report 3. value.title: DAX Fridays! #21: USERELATIONSHIP
